document.full_text: ireland's government wants to impose losses on some senior bondholders in irish lenders to reduce the burden on taxpayers from a prolonged banking crisis, a senior minister said on sunday.
document.title: ireland wants bank bondholders to share the pain
lines_and_colors: ireland's government wants to impose losses on some senior bondholders in irish lenders to reduce the burden on taxpayers from a prolonged banking crisis, a senior minister said on sunday.
